description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve access to livelihoods and socio-economic infrastructures in selected vulnerable communities in the DRC.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement : Article V | The additional conditions of efectiveness consist of the following: (i) The Subsidiary Agreementhas been executed on behalf of the Recipient and the FSRDC; (ii) The Project Implementation Manual has been updated in a manneracceptable to the Association; (iii) The Association is satisfied that the Recipient has an adequate refugee protection framework |Deadline :30-Sept-2020

Financing Agreement, Schedule II, Section I, A, 2 (a): The Recipient shall no later than sixty (60) days after the Effective Date,or such later date as agreed by the Association, establish or cause to be established the Project Provincial Consulting Committeeslisted in the Project Implementation Manual.
